DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE The purpose research determine whether osteopathic manipulative therapy ( OMT ) useful adjunct evaluation treatment headache . PROCEDURES If practitioner determines patient significant headache he/she may order test . He/ She may give patient medication treat headache . The investigator also ask permission evaluate treat headache use osteopathic evaluation Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment ( OMT ) . The bedside evaluation treatment perform emergency medicine resident . Osteopathic evaluation OMT standard care condition . The investigator also may call patient 7 day see . The investigator wish see emergency medicine physician use osteopathic evaluation OMT reliably treat headache . The result examination treatment record , used change treatment change additional test . The investigator wish see whether future use OMT certain case instead conjunction medication . The investigator plan ask 50 patient participate .
DOC.brief_title: Will Use Osteopathic Manipulative Treatments Help Alleviate Headache Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Will Use Osteopathic Manipulative Treatments Patients Headache Emergency Department Result Decreased Pain 100 Point Pain Scale ? PROTOCOL Patients triaged appropriate part Emergency Department usual fashion . A healthcare provider evaluate patient patient 's chief complaint headache provider determine candidate study utilize exclusion criterion study TABLE 1 . ___ Table 1 . Exclusion Criteria Study - Temperature 100.4 great - Healthcare provider suspect meningitis , brain abscess , encephalitis - Altered mental status - History trauma - Cyclic vomit - Abdominal migraine - Analgesic medication take prior treatment within hour - Providing physician suspect intracranial hemorrhage - Focal deficit neurological abnormality lead provide physician suspect pathologic process osteopathic treatment would safe patient - Providing physician feel osteopathic treatment would safe patient If patient none criterion , may select study Providing Physician . The provider ask patient rate initial pain draw vertical line 100 mm visual analog scale ( VAS ) Physician Provider Data Form . The provider alert osteopathic emergency medicine resident enroll patient study . The resident obtain informed consent patient take envelope contain piece paper state whether patient receive actual osteopathic treatment patient receive placebo/sham treatment . Treatment perform osteopathic emergency medicine resident . Each resident undergone training Osteopathic Manipulative Techniques ( OMT ) respective medical school fulfil requirement competency technique graduation . The osteopathic treatment group perform 3 standardized osteopathic manipulative treatment . These treatment muscle energy occipital area ; muscle energy paraspinal muscle bilaterally facilitate positional release without axial compression . If time patient unable tolerate treatment secondary pain particular study stop . At time patient 's medical treatment emergency department delay perform OMT.For example , patient 's nurse enters room medication , study stop patient include study . The sham group receive 3 sham treatment . The patient consent form information whether patient receive osteopathic manipulative treatment keep lock file . The information transfer password-protected computer file . After standardized treatment sham treatment perform , resident leave patient provide physician ask patient draw vertical line VAS rate pain . The provide physician place data form envelope also contain information whether patient receive osteopathic treatment vs. sham treatment , without see actual information . Data analyze kept password-protected file .
